companies.name: Clerk
companies.oneLiner: Drop-in auth for React/Next.js with pre-built UI components
companies.freeTier: Free up to 10,000 monthly active users
companies.spinnerCopy: next-auth: 200+ lines of config. Clerk: 5 lines. Free up to 10K MAU.
companies.statusLineCopy: Clerk (a16z) -- Drop-in auth for React/Next.js. 5 lines of code. Free up to 10K monthly active users.

companies.name: PlanetScale
companies.oneLiner: Serverless MySQL platform with branching, zero-downtime schema changes
companies.freeTier: Hobby tier with 5 GB storage and 1B row reads/mo
companies.spinnerCopy: Schema migrations = downtime. PlanetScale: zero-downtime, Git-like branching.
companies.statusLineCopy: PlanetScale (a16z) -- Serverless MySQL with branching and zero-downtime schema changes. Built on Vitess.

companies.name: Stripe
companies.oneLiner: Payment infrastructure used by 3.1M+ businesses worldwide
companies.freeTier: No monthly fee, pay 2.9% + 30c per transaction
companies.spinnerCopy: Custom payment code: weeks. Stripe Checkout: 7 lines. 3.1M+ businesses use it.
companies.statusLineCopy: Stripe (a16z) -- Payment infrastructure for 3.1M+ businesses. Checkout in 7 lines of code.

companies.name: Replicate
companies.oneLiner: Run open-source ML models with a single API call
companies.freeTier: Free for first predictions, then pay per second of compute
companies.spinnerCopy: Self-host ML: GPU + Docker. Replicate: one API call. Pay per second.
companies.statusLineCopy: Replicate (a16z) -- Run Llama, Stable Diffusion, Whisper with one API call. No GPU setup needed.

companies.name: Groq
companies.oneLiner: LPU-powered LLM inference at 10x the speed of GPU-based providers
companies.freeTier: Free tier with rate limits for Llama and Mixtral models
companies.spinnerCopy: OpenAI API: 500ms avg latency. Groq: 10ms. 50x faster LLM inference.
companies.statusLineCopy: Groq (a16z) -- LPU-powered inference. 50x faster than GPU providers. Free tier for Llama and Mixtral.

companies.name: Fal.ai
companies.oneLiner: Fastest inference API for generative media models
companies.freeTier: Free credits on signup for image generation

companies.statusLineCopy: Fal.ai (a16z) -- Fastest image generation API. Flux in ~1s vs ~12s on DALL-E 3. Free credits on signup.

companies.name: ElevenLabs
companies.oneLiner: AI voice generation with human-quality speech in 29 languages

companies.statusLineCopy: ElevenLabs (a16z) -- Human-quality AI voice in 29 languages. Free 10K characters/month.

companies.name: Mistral
companies.oneLiner: Open-weight LLMs rivaling GPT-4 at a fraction of the cost
companies.freeTier: Open-weight models free to self-host, API with free tier

companies.statusLineCopy: Mistral (a16z) -- Open-weight LLMs rivaling GPT-4. Self-host free or API at 70% lower cost.

companies.name: Arcjet

companies.freeTier: Free tier with 10,000 requests/month
companies.spinnerCopy: DIY rate limiting: fragile + hours. Arcjet: 3 lines. Free 10K requests/mo.

companies.name: Rork

companies.freeTier: Free to start building, deploy on your own accounts

companies.statusLineCopy: Rork (a16z) -- AI mobile app builder. Describe your app, get a working React Native build in minutes.
